page.title: 03New Deer Community Assocn.
page.content: { New Deer Community Association}is a non-political organisation at whose Annual General Meeting all residents of 18yrs. or more have the right to attend and take part in the election of committee members. In any one year there may be more than{25 clubs}and organisations affiliated to the Association although occasionally a club will cease to meet or a new one will be formed. Each club nominates a representative to the { {Management Committee}which also has up to 13{public representatives},a chairman,vice-chairman,treasurer, secretary,Hall-,Park-,and Gala conveners for its{sub-committees. { }The Association employs a Hall- keeper and a Park-keeper to look after the Village Hall and Pleasure Park which it owns and runs for the people with the help of four{trustees}.
